means: （植物）开花( blossom的过去式和过去分词 )
变得更加健康（或自信、成功）

sentence.Network_en: The glory of the idea blossomed in his mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他的脑海中这一想法变得越来越宏大。

sentence.Network_en: What began as a local festival has blossomed into an international event.
sentence.Network_cn: 原先的地方节日已经发展成为一项国际性活动。

sentence.Network_en: She'd blossomed into a self-confident young woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 她已长大成为了一个自信的年轻女性。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Smoke blossomed out from the chimney ., 烟从烟囱里飘散出来.
Youth blossomed into maturity ., 青春已发展到了成熟期.
his career blossomed from then on ., 从那时起他的事业兴旺起来.
She has blossomed into a beautiful young woman ., 她已亭亭玉立 , 成了美丽的少女.

list.abs: 草莓网超低折扣女士香水 - 包邮香港草莓网 ... 幻觉 Psychedelice 梅花 Plum Blossom 果肉 Pulp.
桃色(colour blossoms) @ 坐不住的影片 :: 随意窝 xuite日志
六年级下册英语大本答案_百度知道 ... Tokyo 东京 cherry blossom 樱花 Los Angeles 洛杉矶.
小马驹_百度百科 ... 晨光( Morning Glory) 桃花（peach blossom）( Peach Blossom) 勿忘草( Forget-Me-Not).

entry.def: Blossom is the flowers that appear on a tree before the fruit.

example.ex: The cherry blossom came out early in Washington this year.
example.tran: 今年华盛顿的樱花开得很早。

example.ex: ...the blossoms of plants, shrubs and trees.

entry.tran: 兴盛；变得有魅力；变得成功
entry.def: If someone or something blossoms, they develop good, attractive, or successful qualities.

example.ex: Why do some people take longer than others to blossom?...
example.tran: 为什么有的人比他人大器晚成？

example.ex: What began as a local festival has blossomed into an international event.
example.tran: 最初的地方节日已经发展成了国际性盛会。

entry.def: When a tree blossoms, it produces blossom.

example.ex: Rain begins to fall and peach trees blossom.
example.tran: 开始下雨了，桃树也开花了。

auth_sentence.content: Wikipedia, the community-edited online encyclopedia, has blossomed.

auth_sentence.res_content: Or is it that their creativity has not yet blossomed?

auth_sentence.content: She says the fashion industry here has blossomed.
auth_sentence.res_content: She says the fashion industry here has blossomed.
